source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.
Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 93,491 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,692 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
